summary: Braelynn is a custom Redguard Tank follower available in a custom CBBE or UUNP body; with or without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6][b]Braelynn
[/b][/size][/color]
Character Created by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[/font][/center][center][font=Verdana]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/dhilc2hs7/20161215171420_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Braelynn
Race:  Custom Redguard
Voice:  Female Sultry
Height:  1.00
Weight:  88
Body:  Custom HDT CBBE or UUNP
Skin:  Demoniac
Armor:  Ancient Draugr Armor (doubled stats)
Jewelry:  Various KS Jewelry
Weapons:  Choice of Bow, 1 Handed, 2 Handed
[i]*Just remove whatever you don't wish her to use*[/i]
Location:  Riverwood Campsite - Near Entrance Coming From Helgen

Class:  Combat Barbarian
Style:  Tank

Levels with player.  Redguard traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses:  Sneak, Archery, Light Armor, 1 & 2 Hand, Restoration
Perk Trees:  Archery, Block, Light Armor, 1 & 2 Handed, Sneak
Spells:  Healing Related

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5tvotrj47/20161221203638_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
HDT Compatible Skeleton
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels[/url] (Armor Version Only)

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
Modified Skeleton such as XPMSE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/tjl4ighhj/20161216000736_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/e7z6q0lqf/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4v36zn7d3/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/w0kqxw2yv/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective
[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/sjutmr2br/20161215233533_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you please release the Racemenu preset?
A:  My apologies, I will not be releasing anymore presets due to theft.

Q:  Will you port to SSE?
A:  Eventually yes.  Waiting for Racemenu, HDT, etc. to be ported.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*
A:  I have no immediate plans to change anything at this time.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  Depending on demand at the time; it may take a little longer.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cdhquj9c7/CreditsResources.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]KS Jewelry[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
SG Hairs (Google is your friend)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
Bethesda

*If I forgot anyone; please kindly remind me*
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/b4ygmn6rr/Permissions.png[/img]
This follower is the combination of the work of others.  Please obtain their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/nhdhryt1j/20161215180837_1.jpg[/img]

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:
[/size][/color][/font]
